Summary: While driving to work, seen huge unknown light
divs: sighting details***this report was submitted by the chief investigator *(name deleted--cms\sg) of n. cal.**** "i was driving on my way to work on cherry st when a big bright light caught my attention. it seemed too big to be an airplane. as i continued driving, the light appeared to become bigger. when i turned right on stevenson, i pulled over and took a picture of it with my cell phone. i had to get to work, so i left."
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Newark
There were no other sightings in Newark on or around November 16th 2010
